title: Matej Sivrić
text: Matej Sivrić (born 27 November 1989) is a <a href="Croats">Croatian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>, who plays for <a href="NK%20Marsonia%201909">NK Marsonia 1909</a> in <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>.
